mapper.select: select answerboard_writer from mgm_answerboard where answerboard_seq=#{answerboard_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE mgm_answerboard SET answerboard_title=#{answerboard_title}, answerboard_contents=#{answerboard_contents},answerboard_regdate=now(),answerboard_secret=#{answerboard_secret} WHERE answerboard_seq=#{answerboard_seq}
UPDATE mgm_answerboard SET answerboard_delflag='Y' where answerboard_seq=#{answerboard_seq}

UPDATE mgm_answerboard SET answerboard_step = answerboard_step+1 WHERE answerboard_group=(select answerboard_group from(SELECT answerboard_group FROM mgm_answerboard WHERE answerboard_seq= #{answerboard_seq})as D) AND answerboard_step > (select answerboard_step from (SELECT answerboard_step FROM mgm_answerboard WHERE answerboard_seq= #{answerboard_seq})as E);
